    net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver  

    • Uses of DHCPBinding in net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver

      Methods in net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver that return DHCPBinding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DHCPBinding DHCPPool.addIPv4ToDHCPPool(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ip)
      Adds an IP address to the DHCPPool if the address is not already present.
      DHCPBinding DHCPPool.getAnyAvailableLease(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress mac)
      Returns an available address (DHCPBinding) for lease.
      DHCPBinding DHCPPool.getDHCPbindingFromIPv4(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ip)
      Gets the DHCPBinding object from the DHCPPool containing byte[] ip
      DHCPBinding DHCPPool.getDHCPbindingFromMAC(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress mac)
      Gets the DHCPBinding object from the DHCPPool containing byte[] mac
      DHCPBinding DHCPPool.getSpecificAvailableLease(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.IPv4Address ip, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.MacAddress mac)
      Returns a specific available IP address binding for lease.
      Methods in net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver that return types with arguments of type DHCPBinding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<DHCPBinding> DHCPPool.cleanExpiredLeases()
      Make the addresses of expired leases available and reset the lease times.
      Methods in net.floodlightcontroller.dhcpserver with parameters of type DHCPBinding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Assigns a MAC address to the IP address of the DHCPBinding object in the DHCPPool object.
